trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Hendersonville
There were no other sightings in Hendersonville on or around June 29th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving along 386 when i saw ball of light just appear right above the interstate it sat for a few seconds then was come my direction. I called my friend who was driving just infront of me and we both slowed down to 45 talking trying to figure out what we both were seeing. There was no sound from it yet it was clearly over a few hundred feet up. It made a sharp turn up and out after it went out of sight past us. The light was bigger then any engine could of created. I beleive it was a ufo, i couldnt get the picture out of my head. I know somethings out there and, i think we need to know the truth.
Summary: A hugh ball of light, size of an aircraft itself passing overhead less then 300ft above.
